about_the_game:
The changing set "Beach! in Numazu!!" contains the following elements.

1. "Beach! in Numazu!!" Costume
2. New initial charm "Summertime Yohane"

I will introduce each content.

1. "Beach! in Numazu!!" Costume
A new costume that everyone transforms into a swimsuit!
This costume will be the "Change clothes together" series.
By changing clothes to "Beach! in Numazu!! Costume", the costumes of the summoned friends will change.

Let's change into a perfect swimsuit this summer and adventure in the mirror world!

2. New initial charm "Summertime Yohane"
By changing into a "swimsuit", the initial charm "Summertime Yohane" is equipped.

* Costume will be added to the closet after purchase.
